scripts.build: git pull --no-edit origin master && cd lib && node gen-all-awesome-list.js && mv ./awesome-json/sindresorhus-awesome.json ../all-github-path && mv ./awesome-json/*.json ../repo-json
scripts.push: git add --all . && git commit -m ":chart_with_upwards_trend: UPDATE JSON AT `date`" && git push origin update-branch
